stage1.example: 啊, 我想起来了 (ā, wǒ xiǎng qǐ lái le) - Ah, I remember now
这是一部爱情电影 (zhè shì yī bù ài qíng diàn yǐng) - This is a love movie
房间里很安静 (fáng jiān lǐ hěn ān jìng) - The room is very quiet
她是我的爱人 (tā shì wǒ de ài rén) - She is my wife
过马路的时候要注意安全 (guò mǎ lù de shí hòu yào zhù yì ān quán) - Pay attention to safety when crossing the road

stage2.example: 他喜欢白色 (tā xǐ huān bái sè) - He likes white
她是我们的班长 (tā shì wǒ men de bān zhǎng) - She is our class monitor
怎么办？(zěn me bàn) - What should we do?
我有一个好办法 (wǒ yǒu yī gè hǎo bàn fǎ) - I have a good method
我在办公室里 (wǒ zài bàn gōng shì lǐ) - I am in the office

stage3.definition: Midnight, in the middle of the night
stage3.example: 他半夜还没睡 (tā bàn yè hái méi shuì) - He was still not sleeping at midnight
我帮助她学习汉语 (wǒ bāng zhù tā xué xí hàn yǔ) - I help her learn Chinese
我吃饱了 (wǒ chī bǎo le) - I'm full
我想要报名HSK考试 (wǒ xiǎng yào bào míng HSK kǎo shì) - I want to register for the HSK exam
我爸爸常常读报纸 (wǒ bà ba cháng cháng dú bào zhǐ) - My father often reads the newspaper

stage4.example: 中国的北方很冷 (zhōng guó de běi fāng hěn lěng) - Northern China is very cold
今天的生词我都背完了 (jīn tiān de shēng cí wǒ dōu bèi wán le) - I've memorized all of today's new words
我喜欢运动，比如跑步和打球 (wǒ xǐ huān yùn dòng, bǐ rú pǎo bù hé dǎ qiú) - I like sports, for example, running and playing ball games
他会说很多种外语，比如说：汉语、英语、日语... (tā huì shuō hěn duō zhǒng wài yǔ, bǐ rú shuō: hàn yǔ, yīng yǔ, rì yǔ...) - He can speak many foreign languages, for instance: Chinese, English, Japanese...
这支笔不是我的 (zhè zhī bǐ bú shì wǒ de) - This pen is not mine

stage5.example: 给我看一下你的笔记 (gěi wǒ kàn yī xià nǐ de bǐ jì) - Let me see your notes
这是我新买的笔记本 (zhè shì wǒ xīn mǎi de bǐ jì běn) - This is the notebook I just bought
这个作业今天必须要做完 (zhè ge zuò yè jīn tiān bì xū yào zuò wán) - This homework must be completed today
我坐在床边 (wǒ zuò zài chuáng biān) - I sit on the side of the bed
她变了很多 (tā biàn le hěn duō) - She has changed a lot

stage6.example: 他变成坏人了 (tā biàn chéng huài rén le) - He has become a bad person
这个字我写了一遍就会了 (zhè gè zì wǒ xiě le yī biàn jiù huì le) - I wrote this character once and then I knew it
我买了一个表 (wǒ mǎi le yī gè biǎo) - I bought a watch
他们对我表示了欢迎 (tā men duì wǒ biǎo shì le huān yíng) - They expressed welcome to me
我觉得这件衣服很不错 (wǒ jué de zhè jiàn yī fu hěn bù cuò) - I think this piece of clothing is pretty good

stage7.example: 她不但漂亮，而且很善良 (tā bù dàn piào liang, ér qiě hěn shàn liáng) - She is not only beautiful but also kind
我的钱不够买这部手机 (wǒ de qián bù gòu mǎi zhè bù shǒu jī) - I don't have enough money to buy this phone
这条裤子很好看，不过太贵了 (zhè tiáo kù zi hěn hǎo kàn, bù guò tài guì le) - These pants look good, but they're too expensive
我不太喜欢吃苹果 (wǒ bù tài xǐ huān chī píng guǒ) - I don't really like to eat apples
上课的时候不要讲话 (shàng kè de shí hòu bù yào jiǎng huà) - Don't talk during class

stage8.example: 不好意思，我今天不能来了 (bù hǎo yì si, wǒ jīn tiān bù néng lái le) - Sorry, I can't come today
我刚学汉语不久 (wǒ gāng xué hàn yǔ bù jiǔ) - I just started learning Chinese not long ago
他非常不满 (tā fēi cháng bù mǎn) - He is very dissatisfied

stage8.definition: Not as good as, inferior to
stage8.example: 不如我们明天去看电影吧 (bù rú wǒ men míng tiān qù kàn diàn yǐng ba) - How about we go to the movies tomorrow
今天电影院有不少人 (jīn tiān diàn yǐng yuàn yǒu bù shǎo rén) - There are many people in the cinema today

stage9.example: 他和你不同 (tā hé nǐ bù tóng) - He is different from you
这个办法不行 (zhè gè bàn fǎ bù xíng) - This method is not okay
他不一定会喜欢白色 (tā bù yī dìng huì xǐ huān bái sè) - He doesn't necessarily like white

stage9.definition: Soon after, in a short while
stage9.example: 她不一会儿就到了 (tā bù yī huì er jiù dào le) - She arrived soon after
这本书有三个部分 (zhè běn shū yǒu sān gè bù fèn) - This book has three parts

stage10.example: 你怎么现在才来？(nǐ zěn me xiàn zài cái lái?) - Why are you only coming now?
给我看一下菜单！(gěi wǒ kàn yī xià cài dān!) - Let me see the menu!
明天我去你们学校参观 (míng tiān wǒ qù nǐ men xué xiào cān guān) - Tomorrow I'm going to visit your school
我要参加汉语考试 (wǒ yào cān jiā hàn yǔ kǎo shì) - I want to participate in the Chinese exam
院子里有很多花草 (yuàn zi lǐ yǒu hěn duō huā cǎo) - There are many flowers and grass in the yard
